        @Nullable
public static android.net.NetworkInfo getActiveNetInfo(android.content.Context context)
        Returns active network info
        Parameters:
        context - Application context
        Returns:

      • isUserOnline

        public static boolean isUserOnline(android.content.Context context)
        Parameters:
        context - Application context
        Returns:
        True if active net info is available (connected to a network), false if active net info is null

      • isBehindFirewallOrProxy

        public static boolean isBehindFirewallOrProxy(android.content.Context context)
        This is a blocking method, use it on non UI thread
        Parameters:
        context - Application context
        Returns:
        True if user is online but not reachable, false if user is online or reachable or if user is not online
